title: Champion Mastery end game ranking system is UNREAL
body:
I have been grinding my heart out for mastery 7 on my favorite champion Lux. It seems that no matter how good I do, no matter how many triple kills I land with my Ultimate I cannot get an S. I noticed the system is entirely flawed when I saw that my friend who went 9/3 got an S- and I who went 21/0 got an A-. We were together the whole match helping each other score kills. I understand that he got the S- it was well deserved, but for me to receive such a low score is just unfair. I don't know what you want from me riot! I can only one shot their carries so well! Lux is an ambush assassin mage, its Q E R thats it! I cant do the amazing dashes and close up fights like Yasuo. Lower the "MASTERY" for Lux. I find it impossible to score any thing better than an A with Lux no matter how well I do (not just score wise but setting up kills and combos ect...). 

PS- is this serious? not at all... Im just very upset my time is wasted so often by this what seems like rng based ranking system!

replies.body:
So.. the moral of this story is you are not very good at playing lux, or..?

Also, FGMs always give really easy S ranks, i got something like 8 S- or higher out of 10 ARURF games, nemesis draft is also a gold mine for them. Anything nonmeta totally screws with the grading system.
We are all bad lol, the only person who ever believes we are good is ourselves. Im very good with Lux and I cant prove it and don't want to debate with you skill in League.
I have no problems getting S with Lux. Neither should you. Consider altering your playstyle?

just looking at your warding stats alone, you do very poorly in keeping control of vision which is a pretty big factor as well in scores.

Over all you ward less than 88% of the recorded players. Even if you're a mid laner you should be warding both side bushes, and keeping a pink in top river bush. 

You avg 88 CS per game on Lux, AND your KDA avg is 6/10/5 

You've got a lot to work on if you want to get those mastery levels! 

Good Luck {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

if it's not kda, it's cs, gold, damage
at least til 2 days ago when I actually had most kills, most cs, most gold, most dmg and 2 other people got S's :| sometihng changed?!

S rank depends on many things including roll/cs/kills/deaths/objectives and most importantly so I will include it separately is the relationship of how you did compared to others. My best advice is play normal blind to be against players trying out new champions or arguing about who gets what lane.
